text:
Retired railway employee N. Subramanian donated education materials required for students at Panchayat Union Middle School in Kuruvimalai village near Polur.

Sticker charts for education, sticker labels, note books of sizes, outline maps, colour papers, brown wrapper rolls and pens, pencils, erasers, sharpeners and scales were given for about 120 students. Head mistress Usha Rani and retired head master G. Nandhagopal were present. — Staff Reporter
title: Education materials donated to students
